column8: Total Sexual Offences against Children at the national level, number of police-recorded offences

column3: Definitions: "Sexual offences against children" means crimes of a sexual nature committed against children (according to the age defined in the "Metadata" section below). These crimes should include child pornography offences, procuring a child for prostitution, statutory rape of a person below the age of consent and other offences related to the sexual exploitation of children.

column17: Rate per 100,000 children aged 17 or under

column3: Hong Kong Special Administrative Region of China
Macao Special Administrative Region of China*
The former Yugoslav Rep. of Macedonia

column1: Please note that when using the figures, any cross-national comparisons should be conducted with caution because of the differences that exist between the legal definitions of offences in countries, or the different methods of offence counting and recording.
* Changes in definitions and/or counting rules are reported by the Member State to indicate a break in the time series.
